job.title: Senior QA Automation Engineer  (Java, Selenium, API)
job.description: pstronguSenior QA Automation EngineerustrongppnbspppWe are looking for a Senior QA Engineer to join the team Are you interested in new media social activities and television We are developing the next generation of multimedia and crossplatform entertainmentnbspThe team values software which exemplifies simplicity of design maintainability and foundational robustnessppnbspppAs a Senior QA Engineer you are expected to think critically and ensure quality throughout the mobile automation system The ideal candidate will work with developers product managers QA team members and operations team members to ensure deliverables are timely and meet expectations This role requires the ability to facilitate and manage mobile automation processes including code quality and making overarching technical decisions as well as managing the QA Engineers already working in the automation teamppnbspppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliOversee Associate QA Engineers to ensure code pushed into the repository is high quality and reviewedliliCreate tools that can make the manual and automation QA teams tasks more easily manageableliliMaintain and adjust the automation roadmap to complement the feature roadmapliliWork closely with the rest of the QA team to ensure most valuable automation coverageliliAdditional other duties and responsibilities as assignedliliAnalyze and adjust automation architecture to make it scalable as more features are added across several different platformsliliCreate system so that tools are accessible as needed to the QA team and other teams as neededliliWork with various engineering teams to integrate QA system with all available build systemsliliDefine the test automation framework scripting and make sure the team is delivering them within expected timelinesliulpnbspppstrongRequirementsstrongpulli4 years of experience in advanced Java Selenium API automationliliCoaching training and mentoring QA engineers and ensuring that quality standards are met across the entire team 25 peopleliliExperience using Jenkins or similar CICD toolsliliAbility to writeexecute test casessuites for multiplatform application softwareliliExperience with Postman Charles Proxy andor Rest AssuredliliOutstanding communication organizational and interpersonal skills with both a technical and nontechnical audienceliliWork to consistently improve testing efficiency  including for regression testingliliBABS in computer science or any related technical field or equivalent work experienceliliActively tested for defect across multiple platformsliliKnowledge of video technologies in both objective C and javaliliStrong understanding of agile test tools and methodologiesliul
